mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure all images are responsive and scale properly on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and reduce the use of large JavaScript files.
seoOptimizationTip: Add relevant meta descriptions and alt text to all images.

bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking form by reducing the number of required fields.
